meanings.sent1: The undomestic cat prowled the forest freely.
meanings.sent2: The undomesticated wolf howled at the moon.
meanings.sent3: The undomestic squirrel refused to share its acorns.
meanings.sent4: Her undomestic spirit rebelled against confinement.
meanings.sent5: The undomestic horse galloped wild and free.

meanings.definition: Not suited to household life or tasks.
meanings.sent1: The undomestic plant struggled to survive indoors.
meanings.sent2: The undomestic furniture was too large for the small room.
meanings.sent3: The undomestic toaster burnt every slice of bread.
meanings.sent4: His undomestic skills led to chaos in the kitchen.

meanings.definition: Not of or relating to the home or family.
meanings.sent1: His undomestic interests focused on exploring faraway lands.
meanings.sent2: The undomestic painting depicted a vast, unknown universe.
meanings.sent3: The undomestic bookshelf held only adventure novels.
meanings.sent4: Her undomestic thoughts wandered beyond the familiar.
meanings.sent5: The undomestic traveler never stayed in one place for long.
